class.name: pcl_tools/PCL2MapRegistration
class.description: Nodelet for mrs pointcloud registration to a priori map.

class.name: pcl_tools/PCLPublishCloudFileToNetwork
class.description: Nodelet for publishing a cloud file to the ROS network.

class.name: pcl_tools/FreespacePointcloudCreator
class.description: Creates a pointcloud with points corresponding to zero or invalid points in an organized input pointcloud with the same direction and max. length to represent free space for mapping purposes.
